channel.title: nginx on Peng ganyu blog
channel.description: Recent content in nginx on Peng ganyu blog

item.title: Nginx学习
item.description: Mac下nginx命令 sudo brew install nginx: brew安装nginx /usr/local/etc/nginx/nginx.conf: nginx配置文件路径 sudo nginx：启动nginx sudo nginx -s stop: 停止nginx sudo nginx -s reload: 重启n
